text: An inhibitory effect of Farfugium japonicum ( L . ) Kitamura essential oil , namely constituted by 1undecene , 1 - nonene and β - caryophyllene , on NO and PGE 2 production in LPS - stimulated RAW 264 . 7 cells were found by Kim et al . ( 2008 ) [ 144 ] , with a concomitant inhibition of iNOS and COX - 2 mRNA expression , might explain the anti - inflammatory activity of this oil . The same authors in another work , and using the essential oil of Illicium anisatum L . , mainly constituted by 1 , 8 - cineole , also demonstrated its capacity for inhibiting NO and PGE 2 production in LPS - stimulated RAW 264 . 7 cells , along with the decrease of iNOS and COX - 2 proteins and iNOS and COX - 2 mRNA expression [ 145 ] .
